name: 5th World Conference on Media and Communication
content: The 5th edition of the World Conference on Media and Communication will be bringing together members of academia from around the world for three days of intense learning, discussions, and networking. The WORLDCMC 2025 is the ideal venue to network with peers, discover new trends and research, and gain fresh perspectives on various topics in media and communication. The conference also provides inspiration and motivation from industry leaders. You’ll learn crucial information from 27 – 29 March 2025 in Oxford, United Kingdom, to help you succeed in your professional or academic career.
